oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Battle of Franklin Centennial Participants medal

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Historical reenactments; War
Franklin, Battle of, Franklin, Tenn., 1864; Tennessee - Civil War Centennial Commission; United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865 - Centennial celebrations, etc.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Battle of Franklin Centennial Participants medal. The medal is round with two images of Civil War soldiers. The text on the medal reads "Battle of Franklin Centennial Participants, November 1864-1964."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Civil War Centennial Commission Records 1961-1965, RG 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Civil War; Centennial Commission was charged with planning, organizing, and documenting the U. S. Civil War Centennial through a campaign of public awareness, education, preservation, and restoration.
